title: Buried for Pleasure
description: Professor Gervase Fen, always in pursuit of a witty epigram, declares candidacy for Parliament, ready to serve the good people of "Where was it again?" His political ambitions are sidetracked by the murdered policeman who crops up on the campaign trail, the escaped naked lunatic "Woodrow Wilson", a peculiar clergyman, and a love-struck pig.
author: Edmund Crispin
